class.name: gd_V3d_StereoDumpOptions
class.brief_description: Options to be used with image dumping for stereo cameras.
class.description:
Provides options for dumping images from stereo cameras in OpenCASCADE. The value will have no effect with disabled stereo output.
This class is a Godot GDExtension wrapper for the OpenCASCADE V3d_StereoDumpOptions enum.

constants.constant: Ignore stereo mode and dump monographic projection for stereo camera.
Dump only left eye projection for stereo camera.
Dump only right eye projection for stereo camera.
Dump blended pair specific to the active device output Graphic3d_StereoMode. Result will be undefined for modes like Graphic3d_StereoMode_QuadBuffer.
